title: Instructional Design for Improving Online Science Education Satisfaction

context.additional_context: Science Education for Working Professionals Using Real-Time Video Classes via Smartphones: Mobile-Optimized Content Required Due to Learners' Limited Technology Access

learning_goals: Learners can apply three interaction strategies to enhance learner engagement in online science classes
Learners can explain at least two principles of effective online learning content design for smartphone environments
Learners can analyze three or more factors influencing online education satisfaction and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
